short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DeckBird.ai is the #1 presentation sharing tool, transforming presentations into AI sales and marketing assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
10x the Click Rate by Embedding Presentation Directly to Email with Slide Autoplay. Works with Gmail, Outlook, Mailchimp, Constant Contact, or your own email server.

10x the Reach by Easy Sharing to Messaging Apps and Social Networks. One click share to Slack, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Twitter.

10x the Impact with AI Voice/Video Narrating. Supports 9 world languages and 32 avatar voices: English (American, British), Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese.

10x the Sales Lead with Built-in CRM & Meeting Scheduling. 
Meeting: Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Team, Webex. 
Calendar: Google Calendar, Microsoft Calendar. 
CRM: Hubspot, Salesforce, Salesloft, Pipedrive.

To get started, simply visit us at DeckBird.ai and sign up for a free account using your email or via Gmail, LinkedIn, or Twitter to sign on. For more info, please go to https://www.deckbird.ai.
